Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency

Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Greater Resolve: Critical failures on Will saves are normal failures/Takes half damage on failed Will saves
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes

Composition Spells: Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point/Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage spells

Occult Spellcasting: May learn spells from the Occult tradition
Perfect Encore: +1 10th level spell slot
Soothing Ballad: Knows the Soothing Ballad spell/+1 Focus Points
Triple Time: Knows the Triple Time cantrip
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day
Deep Lore: Knows 1 additional spell of each level
Eclectic Polymath: May retain Esoteric Polymath spell in repertoire by removing a spell of the same level
Effortless Concentration: May extend the duration of 1 spell as a free action
Esoteric Polymath: May use Occultism to add spells to spellbook
Eternal Composition: May use an additional action each rd to cast a composition cantrip
Harmonize: May have 2 composition spells active simultaneously
Impossible Polymath: May add spells from trained traditions to spellbook
Inspirational Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Magnum Opus: Knows 2 10th-level occult spells
Multifarious Muse (Enigma Muse): Knows a 1st-level enigma muse spell
Multifarious Muse (Maestro Muse): Knows a 1st-level maestro muse spell
Multifarious Muse (Polymath Muse): Knows a 1st-level polymath muse spell
Polymath Muse: Knows the Unseen Servant spell
Quickened Casting: Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action
Reach Spell: May extend spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: May freely heighten a chosen spell of each level
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Studious Capacity: May cast 1 additional spell of level 9 or lower each day
Symphony Of The Muse: May have any number of composition spells active simultaneously
Unusual Composition: May replace somatic components of a composition spell with verbal components or vice versa
Versatile Signature: May change 1 signature spell each day
